<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-switch
        inset
        label="Toggle between light and dark theme."
        v-model="darkModeLocal"
        @change="changeTheme"
        color="success"
      >
      </v-switch>
    </v-card-text>
    {{ darkMode }}
  </v-card>
</template>
<script>
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";
import { mapState } from "vuex";

export default {
  name: "SettingsView",
  data() {
    return {
      theme: useTheme(),
      darkModeLocal: true,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    changeTheme() {
      this.theme.global.name = this.darkModeLocal ? "darkMode" : "lightMode";
      localStorage.setItem("theme", this.darkModeLocal);
    },
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(["darkMode"]),
  },
  mounted() {
    this.darkModeLocal = this.darkMode;
  },
};
</script>
